mapper.insert: INSERT INTO restcomm_connectors (port, transport, account_sid, n_point, n_point_route, n_point_route_alt) VALUES(#{port}, #{transport}, #{account_sid}, #{n_point}, #{n_point_route}, #{n_point_route_alt});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM restcomm_connectors WHERE n_point=#{n_point} AND port=#{port} AND transport=#{transport};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM restcomm_connectors WHERE n_point=#{n_point} AND port=#{port} AND transport=#{transport};
